analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/46/0x45038b67b1b55d7e3e142eec49ce6bd2254c4e57.sol:
	Contract NARCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/46/0x45038b67b1b55d7e3e142eec49ce6bd2254c4e57.sol#321-323)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x45038b67b1b55d7e3e142eec49ce6bd2254c4e57.sol:
